message: External API dependency failure (Roblox API) impacting functionality.

incident.impactSummary: Services requiring interaction with the Roblox API are currently experiencing errors or outages.
incident.rootCause: External dependency failure (Roblox API reported being down).
incident.mitigation: Monitoring external dependency status and implementing temporary caching/fallback where possible.
incident.detection: Automated dependency monitoring alert / User reports.
actionItems: Communicate user action requirement (rejoining the server).
Monitor user connection and data synchronization rates.
Monitor status of external Roblox API
Investigate potential temporary data caching solutions
Track user reporting and ensure data access is fully restored upon user rejoin.
Monitor Roblox status page for resolution.
Quantify total impact on downstream internal services.

postmortemPlan.summary: Analyze impact of external dependency failure and review resilience strategies.
actionItems: Review external dependency failure handling procedures.
Implement improved circuit breaker or throttling for Roblox API.

timeline.event: System rollback pushed following unsuccessful fix attempt.
Confirmed root cause: External Roblox API down, preventing data access.
Rollback pushed and completed following a fix.
Report received that Roblox API dependency was unavailable.
